name: MathFunctions
0:
”Alexa, ask math functions what is the value of sine 30?”
”What is cot 60?”
”cosec 75”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math functions
des:
This skill is really helpful for students to quickly get values of various math functions just using their voice. 
Only trigonometric functions available for now. Stay tuned for further updates! Hope you like this skill!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
